questions.question: What is the yield percentage of tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate synthesized under nitrogen atmosphere?
Which metal salts led to the formation of homoleptic complexes when reacted with tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate?
What is the space group of the homoleptic complex formed with Fe and tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate?
True or False: The Cd coordination polymer formed with tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate binds through the N2 atoms.
What is the common feature of the crystal structures of Fe, Co, and Ni complexes with tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate?
questions.answer: They all have an octahedral geometry.

questions.question: True or False: The synthesis of tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate was performed in an oxygen atmosphere.
What was the reaction temperature for the synthesis of tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate?
True or False: The Cd coordination polymer is isostructural with previously made Cd complexes with similar tripodal ligands.
What is the role of sodium borohydride in the synthesis of tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate?
questions.answer: It acts as a reducing agent.

questions.question: True or False: The Fe complex of tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate undergoes spin-crossover.
What solvent was used for the synthesis of tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate?
True or False: Tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate forms coordination polymers with all divalent transition metals.
How does the binding motif of tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate change with different metals?
questions.answer: It forms octahedral metal complexes with Fe, Co, or Ni, but a coordination polymer with Cd.

questions.question: True or False: The synthesis of tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate involves a reaction time of one day.
What is the significance of the ambidentate nature of tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate in forming complexes?
questions.answer: It allows for a variety of structures based on the choice of metal and its oxidation state.

questions.question: True or False: The sodium variant of tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate was characterized using infrared spectroscopy.
What is the role of tetrahydrofuran in the purification process of tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate?
questions.answer: It is used to remove trace impurities.

questions.question: True or False: The crystal structure of the Cd coordination polymer with tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate is similar to that of BIFs formed with tris(imidazolyl)borates.
What distinguishes the Cd coordination polymer's binding from the Fe complex in terms of atom involvement?
questions.answer: The Cd coordination polymer binds through the N3 atoms, while the Fe complex binds through the N2 atoms.

questions.question: True or False: The synthesis of tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate was conducted without the use of a nitrogen atmosphere.
